General.Name: Sichuan Road & Bridge Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Road & Bridge Co., Ltd. engages in the investment, development, construction, and operation of engineering construction, mining, clean energy, and new materials in China and internationally. The company constructs highways, municipalities, railway, roads, tunnel, housing construction, port and shipping, etc. It also engages in the clean energy activities through hydro and wind power plants; graphite, iron, gold, phosphate, copper, and nepheline mining; and land consolidation, and financial security businesses. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Chengdu, China. Sichuan Road & Bridge Co.,Ltd operates as a subsidiary of Sichuan Railway Investment Group Co., Ltd.
